content.rendered:
Please place your order with once day before till 14:00 a clock.

CUSTOM CAKE gluten free

No add: sugar, animal ingredients, flour, artificial essences, additives, flavor enhancers, preservatives.

Please insert the Cake Decoration Text  in the Checkout page.ge.

Please note that: Our cakes have to be kept in the freezer, in order to make sure they keep their texture and all the nutrients intact. That’s why we recommend that you keep yours at room temperature minimum 1 hour, before eating – so you can fully enjoy them at their best.

excerpt.rendered: almonds, cashew, natural cocoa , alkaline cocoa, strawberry, vanilla, rum, cocoa butter, sweetened with: unfiltered honey / syrup dates – made from us/ chicory inulin – low glycemic index – good for the diabetics , gluten free
